refnamediv.refpurpose: A utility to report and change SIDs in registry files

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: This tool is part of the samba 7 suite.
profiles is a utility that reports and changes SIDs in windows registry files. It currently only supports NT.

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.variablelist:
file
Registry file to view or edit.
-v,--verbose
Increases verbosity of messages.
-c SID1 -n SID2
Change all occurrences of SID1 in file by SID2.
&stdarg.help;

refsect1.title: VERSION
refsect1.para: This man page is correct for version 3 of the Samba suite.

refsect1.title: AUTHOR
refsect1.para: The original Samba software and related utilities were created by Andrew Tridgell. Samba is now developed by the Samba Team as an Open Source project similar to the way the Linux kernel is developed.
The profiles man page was written by Jelmer Vernooij.
